channel.title: cite as you write on Better BibTeX for Zotero
channel.description: Recent content in cite as you write on Better BibTeX for Zotero

item.title: Cite as you Write
item.description: PSA: as of Zotero 5.0.71, access to this URL will no longer work from the browser for security reasons; curl and other programmatic access will work. In 5.0.71 and 5.0.72 you were required to send a User-Agent header (anything will work, as long as it’s there, curl sends a user-agent header by default); as of 5.0.73, the user agent requirement was dropped. Good news for TeXnicians and those down with Mark (aka Markdown, RST, whatnot): this is the time to go pester the author of your favorite editor for Zotero integration!
